"The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!" Transliteration: "Kyōdai no Kizuna - Rufi to Sabo Saikai Hiwa" (Japanese: 兄弟の絆 ルフィ・（と）サボ再会秘話)
"The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!" Transliteration: "Saikyō no Seibutsu - Yonkō: Hyakujū no Kaidō" (Japanese: 最強の生物 四皇・百獣のカイドウ)
"Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!" Transliteration: "Fujitora Ugoku - Mugiwara no Ichimi Kanzen Hōimō" (Japanese: 藤虎動く 麦わらの一味完全包囲網)
"A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!" Transliteration: "Hijō Jitai - Sarawa-reta Rebekka!" (Japanese: 非常事態 さらわれたレベッカ！)
"The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!" Transliteration: "Oyako no Kizuna - Kyurosu to Rebekka!" (Japanese: 父娘の絆 キュロスとレベッカ！)
"Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!" Transliteration: "Otoko no Iji - Rufi tai Fujitora Makkō Shōbu" (Japanese: 男の意地 ルフィVS（たい）藤虎真向勝負)
Directed by: Directed by : Yasunori Koyama Storyboarded by : Takashi Ōtsuka

Title [n 3]: "No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!" Transliteration: "Nigeba Nashi - Taishō Fujitora Hijō no Tsuigeki!" (Japanese: 逃場無し 大将藤虎非情の追撃！)
"Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet Is Formed!" Transliteration: "Kobun no Sakazuki - Kessei! Mugiwara Dai Sendan!" (Japanese: 子分の盃 結成！麦わら大船団！)
"The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World" Transliteration: "Gun'yū-kakkyo - Arekurū Shin Sekai no Kaibutsu-tachi" (Japanese: 群雄割拠 荒狂う新世界の怪物達)
